name: Brace for Impact!
description:
Brace for impact as space pirates swarm in your direction, and fight for your life through their hordes in a dangerous asteroid belt in a distant solar system. How long can you survive?

Made in about a week for Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2!

Controls:

  • W / Up Arrow Key - Move up
  • S / Down Arrow Key - Move down
  • A / Left Arrow Key - Move left
  • D / Right Arrow Key - Move right
  • Left Mouse Button - Fire
  • Right Mouse Button - Fire a stronger attack that propels you backwards
